title: Bug splat in first game and lag spikes
body: After re-installing league client I've been getting a bug where every first game of the day in (ranked,custom), I get bug splat saying I have corrupted file error. I deleted and re-installed it yet to have the same problem. There is also random high ping spikes 30 ms- 8000 ms every game I play which could be related to the corrupted files. How can I fix this?

replies.body:
Those pings spikes, yikes. Aaaaaalmost over 9000 xD. Sorry I couldn't resist.....

There might still be some of those corrupted files sticking around even after you try uninstalling the usual way. Let's have you try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) really quickly and running it with both **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on to make sure you fully wipe all those damaged files.
